title: Kinda Funny: The Animated Series - Ep. 4 "God Damn It, Barb"
description:
Watch Kinda Funny: The Animated Series Episodes 1,2, and 3!

Ep. 1 "Politically Correct Dodgeball": https://youtu.be/2yhISvYtugM

Ep. 2 "Haters Gonna Hate": https://youtu.be/x-ukJa3fG2Y

Ep. 3 "Classic Colin": https://youtu.be/apfwjkYgcNQ

Support us at http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny
 
Subscribe to Kinda Funny! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy
 
 
Written by Nick Scarpino
Animation by Dagan Moriarty
Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
 
Barbara Dunkelman as Nerdy Barb Dunkelman http://www.twitter.com/BDunkelman

Ashley Jenkins as Wendy Spencer
http://www.twitter.com/AshleyJ

Matt Scarpino as Matt Scarpino http://www.twitter.com/ScarpinoMan

 

Follow us on Twitter!

Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys

transcript_chunks.text: I'm GNA split this log like Teddy Roosevelt split the vote in 1912, that's it, I'm done, let's go home. Colin, don't be such a Cragin; we're experiencing The Great Outdoors, take it in the sun, the trees, the West Nile-infected mosquitoes, the man-eating bears. Oh, don't be silly, Colin; bears don't eat people; they eat honey like Winnie the Pooh. What the hell are your parents doing to you, Tim? What are you doing? I'm making a campfire so Wendy Spencer knows I can bring it. It's 85° out here; why would you light a fire? I watched a BuzzFeed list video that outlined 17 things I can do to impress a girl. Number 16 was to be manly around her, and nothing says manly like a roaring fire. What was number 17? Make lots of money. You might want to focus more on that one, Barb. When you're done unpacking my stuff, can you bring me some sparkling water? Of course, thanks, doll balls. Why do you let them treat you like that? You and I both know there's a natural pecking order in high school; Wendy and Troy are upperclassmen.

bring me a spark ling water of course thanks doll balls why do you let them treat you like that you and I both know there's a natural pecking order in high school Wendy and Troy are upper classmen that means they're better than us I consider it an honor to be in their presence and one day Wendy will repay me for my years of loyal servitude by making me one of them Barb they're not vampires for Christ's sake no Nick they're better they're popular you wouldn't understand the only thing you care about in life is curating your Pornhub playlist how' you even get invited on this trip anyway my brother plays drums in Troy's band he said we could come with him if I wash his car shirtless for the next month why shirtless cuz he knows it's my deepest fear don't embarrass me penis Tim does realize he doesn't have a chance with Wendy Spencer right you know I don't think Tim's brain works that way what are you doing laying down in this comfy bare skin rug you brought with us I didn't bring a

doesn't have a chance with Wendy Spencer right you know I don't think Tim's brain works that way what are you doing laying down in this comfy bare skin rug you brought with us I didn't bring a bare skin rug what do we do what do we do what do we do someone needs to make themselves look really big I hate you guys this Situation's getting Grizzly it's unbearable God damn it Barb huh that's interesting oh God I think he scared of your Prince impression what Prince impression that's just how I scream whatever it was do it again good God it's working keep doing it holy **** I can't believe that worked I owe you what they call a life debt just really speaks to the depth and versatility of Prince that man was a true artist my hero of course he's your hero Prince is everybody's hero can somebody help me please n
